Storyline:


     Alain Lefevre is a boxer, paid by a Marseille mobster to take a dive. When he wins the fight he attempts to flee to America with the mobster's girlfriend Katrina. This plan fails and he seeks escape by joining the French Foreign Legion. The mobster soon discovers his whereabouts and hires two hitmen to finish him off. With their fort under siege and enemies within, Lefevre finds that second chances are difficult to come by in the Legion.
